articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Flight Training of First Group of Women Supersonic Fighter Pilots
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Flight Training of First Women Supersonic Fighter Pilots
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched a flight training of women supersonic fighter pilots Jo Kum Hyang and Rim Sol.
					 He learned about a taking-off and landing solo flight training plan of women fighter pilots at the airfield runway before watching their training.
					
					 Seeing their solo flight with satisfaction, he said with pleasure that young girls are very admirable, they are flowers of the sky and women supersonic fighter pilots came into being for the first time in the history of army building.
					
					 Watching them promptly dealing with sudden circumstances, he said that he was very pleased with their brave training. He highly appreciated them, saying that the girls' solo flight of supersonic fighters in which it is hard for men to fly is a success to be proud of in the world.
					
					 At the end of the training he met with Jo Kum Hyang and Rim Sol and congratulated them on their successful training.
					
					 Warmly taking the hands of the pilots weeping tears of joy after receiving bouquets, he said that they successfully conducted solo flight though there are a few countries with women pilots of supersonic fighters. This is not because their physical conditions and technological preparations are good but it is a revelation of the noble revolutionary spirit in which they cherished the warm love for the country and the transparent spirit of defending the country and ideologically accepted the Workers' Party of Korea's training-first policy and remained loyal to the intention of the Supreme Commander.
					
					 He had a photo session with the pilots.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, O Kum Chol and Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: SPA Chairman Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Leaves for Russia
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and his party left here on Monday to visit Russia.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for Cuba
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for Cuba
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Party Central Committee, left here Monday to visit Cuba.

articles.title: Delegation of Int'l Planned Parenthood Federation Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Int'l Planned Parenthood Federation Here
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Planned Parenthood Federation led by Director-general Tewodros Melesse arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Russian Guests Here
articles.content:
Russian Guests Here
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Byacheslav Goncharov, editor-in-chief of the organ of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Mongolian Friendship Delegation Here
articles.content:
Mongolian Friendship Delegation Here
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of the Department for the Diplomatic Corps Service of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia led by Director Otgonbayar Zayamandakh arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Supreme Public Prosecutors Office Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Supreme Public Prosecutors Office Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme Public Prosecutors Office led by Director Jang Pyong Gyu flew back home Monday after visiting Russia.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The editor-in-chief of the organ of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and his party, a friendship delegation of the Department for the Diplomatic Corps Service of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and other foreign guests visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Many Technological Innovations Applied to Waterway Project
articles.content:
Many Technological Innovations Applied to Waterway Project 
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The mass technological innovation movement is giving an impetus to the waterway project now underway in South Hwanghae Province, one of granaries in the DPRK.  
					 Especially, it has proved effective in the expansion and concrete cover of waterway tunnels, making it possible to economize materials, electricity and manpower.
					
					 By applying new methods, builders moved away hundreds of thousands cubic meters of earth and bedrock in three months. 
					
					 The Hydraulic Engineering Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences invented new technological methods to ensure the stability of reservoir dam and preventing water gland in building waterway.

articles.title: Natural Graphite Products
articles.content:
Natural Graphite Products
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Home-made natural graphite products have been widely applied to different fields of economy in the DPRK.
					 Among them are graphite electrode for UHP electric arc furnace, graphite brushes (S113A, S216), carborundum heating element and graphite crucible.
					
					 The graphite brushes have been exported to other countries.
					
					 The quality of those graphite products reaches to the international standards.

articles.title: Efforts Paid to Tending Fruit Trees in DPRK
articles.content:
Efforts Paid to Tending Fruit Trees in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been directed to manuring and cultivating fruit trees in the DPRK.
					 As part of this campaign, primary attention is being paid to spraying botanical exterminators to prevent fruit trees from harmful insects.
					
					 Toksong Apple Farm is concentrating its efforts to bagging apples, putting orchards into good condition.
					
					 The same is true of other farms including Tongrim Fruit Farm and Ryongjon Fruit Farm.

articles.title: Adiabatic Sash under Production in DPRK
articles.content:
Adiabatic Sash under Production in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A process for manufacturing adiabatic sash was installed in the Mangyongdae Aeguk Aluminum Sash Factory.
					 In this regard, Kim Po Ung, chief engineer of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 The adiabatic sash helps prevent heat conduction and hold the temperature in buildings. It has been proved more effective than aluminum sash in holding the indoor temperature in all season and looks smart. The sash is in high demand in the country.

articles.title: Drought to Linger in DPRK
articles.content:
Drought to Linger in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- From June 11 to 22, overall areas of North and South Hwanghae provinces in the DPRK witnessed much rain, with 95 mm in Haeju City and 99 mm in Samchon, 97 mm in Sinchon, 72 mm in Anak, 90 mm in Sinphyong, 80 mm in Unpha, 79 mm in Koksan and 77 mm in Suan counties.
					 In this regard, Sim Myong Ok, deputy director of the Central Weather Forecast Station under the State Hydro-meteorological Administration, told KCNA:
					
					 Though it rained in North and South Hwanghae provinces, drought would continue to linger in the country.
					
					 As the anticyclone over northwest Pacific, which would affect the Eastern Asia, is not getting stronger enough due to El Nino, the rainy season is anticipated to set in late with comparatively little rainfall.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Independently Solving Issue of Inter-Korean Relations by Concerted Efforts of Koreans
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Independently Solving Issue of Inter-Korean Relations by Concerted Efforts of Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The north and the south of Korea should put an end to the confrontation as early as possible and advance toward reconciliation and reunification, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article. 
					 To this end it is necessary to solve the issues of the inter-Korean relations and reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 To independently solve the above-said issues by pooling the efforts of the Korean nation responsible for them is the principle of reunification common to the nation which the north and the south agreed and promised to abide by to the whole nation in the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The October 4 declaration reiterated the fundamental spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, solemnly declaring once again internally and externally the principle of independence as a fundamental one for national reunification. 
					
					 The north and the south should independently solve the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans while rejecting outsiders' interference as indicated by the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 The U.S. is not pleased to see the north and the south independently solve the issue by their concerted efforts and it is further intensifying its interference in the issue of the inter-Korean relations to stand in the way of achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations fall victim to the outsiders' hostile policy towards the DPRK due to the south Korean conservative ruling quarters' acts of persistently pursuing flunkeyism and dependence on outside forces opposed to national independence and cooperation between compatriots. 
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to save the inter-Korean relations from catastrophe and open up a turning phase for national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to opt for solving the issues of the inter-Korean relations and reunification in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Designation of National History Park
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Designation of National History Park 
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. government announced that the facilities related to the "Manhattan project" would be formally designated as a national history park within this summer.
					 It talked rubbish that the park serves as a place which helps deepen the understanding of the event which changed the world and as an icon showing rapid progress in science.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says this is gangster-like sophism that can be let loose only by the worst nuclear war maniacs making profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					The U.S. development of A-bomb did not bring about any change and, if there be any, it only ushered in the era of nuclear threat and blackmail and nuclear arms race, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. abused the nuclear technology for realizing its ambition for world domination though it should have been used for promoting human civilization and well-being. What the U.S. did was, therefore, a crime against humanity which should be cursed for centuries.
					
					 The U.S. is talking volumes about its act of imposing a nuclear disaster on humankind for the first time as pride, an indication of its intention to keep bringing such disaster to mankind in the future, too.
					
					 The historical lesson taught by what happened in the past 70 years is that any country can suffer from another nuclear disaster any time without having its own nuclear deterrent, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Conniving at GIs' Moves for Bio-chemical War
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Conniving at GIs' Moves for Bio-chemical War
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- An editorial accusing the south Korean conservative regime of conniving at GIs' moves for a bio-chemical warfare was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on June 19.
					 It has been recently disclosed that the U.S. forces present in south Korea set up labs for carrying out their "Jupiter plan" in their bases in Ryongsan of Seoul, Osan and Phyongtaek of Kyonggi Province and Kunsan of North Jolla Province, the editorial noted, adding:
					
					 This indicates that GIs are scaling up their experiments for a germ warfare including those for anthrax germs.
					
					 What matters is that the Ministry of Defense is ignorant of any information concerning the experiments and the chief executive is keeping mum about it.
					
					 The editorial termed Chongwadae keen on propaganda about the chief executive, the Ministry of Defense speaking for the U.S. and the present regime a social disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Fascist Action Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Fascist Action Protested
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean fascist police searched the office room of the April 16 Solidarity, a civic organization staging actions in demand of probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, on June 19, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The fascist police authorities took this action on charge that Pak Rae Gun, co-chairman of the All-People Measure Council for Ferry Sewol Disaster, spearheaded the memorial service for the victims of the disaster. 
					
					 The April 16 Solidarity in a statement on the same day said that the action taken by the police is little short of completely turning down the public demand for salvaging the sunken ferry and probing the truth about the disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces U.S. Scenario for Germ Warfare and Authorities Toeing It
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces U.S. Scenario for Germ Warfare and Authorities Toeing It
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on June 19 in an editorial condemned the U.S. for frantically stepping up its preparations for a germ warfare and the south Korean conservative regime following it.
					 New facts have been disclosed one after another when the regime busied itself with the moves to conceal the truth while speaking for the U.S., the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The anthrax germ case and dependence and incompetence of the south Korean regime objectively confirm once again the reason why the U.S. troops should quit south Korea at an early date and an end should be put to the present regime.
					
					 The U.S. troops are the root cause of all evils in south Korea. This is an undeniable stark fact.
					
					 The U.S. forces should quit south Korea at once with their anthrax germs.

articles.title: Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Support Statement of DPRK Government
 Tokyo, June 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements on June 20 in support of the statement issued by the DPRK government on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, warmly welcomed the statement of the DPRK government on behalf of all officials and compatriots of the headquarters.
					
					 Kim Chun Gwon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the statement of the DPRK government represented its firm stand and determination to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 Kim Hak Bok, chairperson of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, expressed determination to make every possible effort to create a climate favorable for mending the inter-Korean relations and implement the north-south joint declarations in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself as clarified in the statement of the DPRK government.
					
					 Pak Sun Ho, chairperson of the Ehime Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, fully supported the stand clarified in the statement of the DPRK government, vowing to actively contribute to opening a broad avenue to independent reunification by arousing all Koreans under the headquarters to the drive for implementing it.
					
					 Ri Thae Hyong, chairman of the Hiroshima Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted that a broad avenue would be opened to independent reunification as desired by the Korean nation when the south Korean authorities sincerely accept the principled stand clarified in the statement of the DPRK government and honestly respond to it. 
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said all Chongryon officials and other compatriots under the headquarters will devote all their efforts and wisdom to the drive for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Feats Praised by Politician of Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Feats Praised by Politician of Hungary
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, issued a statement on June 15 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said that Kim Jong Il put forward the young people as the master of the future and perfectly settled the youth issue, bringing them up to be reliable pillars of the country. He went on:
					
					 Respected HE Kim Jong Un took the youth dearest by carrying forward the idea of Kim Jong Il on attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 The great feats he performed for the strengthening of the WPK and the Korean people will be immortal and his cause is being successfully carried forward thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Russia
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The East European and Central Asian regional seminar on the Juche idea on the theme of "Juche idea and theoretical and practical issues on independence in East European countries" took place in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, chiefs of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea in different countries and personages from political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia. A delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea was present on invitation. 
					
					Congratulatory speeches were made by some personages at the seminar to be followed by a report made by Mikhail Panchenko.
					
					 Representatives of organizations for the study of the Juche idea in foreign countries made speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the Songun politics is the most efficient and just politics which guarantees the victory of the cause of the popular masses for independence and that the reality of the DPRK which is making a leaping progress forward in building a thriving socialist nation while shattering the provocative moves of the U.S. and its followers for a war and aggression clearly proves the originality, validity and tremendous vitality of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Songun politics.
					
					 They hardened their will to adhere to the anti-imperialist independent stand, display a high degree of patriotism and further strengthen the solidarity based on independence.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Foreigners Support June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Foreigners Support June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a lecture in Mongolia, meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show in Finland and seminar in Germany on June 12 and 13 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their famous works, and books and photos introducing the efforts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious with Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 The former advisor to the Mongolian foreign minister said that the June 15 joint declaration on which the north and the south of Korea agreed to settle the issue of national reunification independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation should be implemented without fail.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektu Association of Finland noted that the joint declaration is a brilliant fruition of the patriotic devotion made by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to reunify Korea.
					
					 The organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association fully supported the joint declaration and extended invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people's cause of reunification.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Finland.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Guinean Personage
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Guinean Personage
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, released a statement on June 13 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 He said that leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the north-south summit was provided in Pyongyang in June, 2000, the first of its kind in the history of Korea's division, and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted and published there.
					
					 The joint declaration is the great programme for reunification common to the Korean nation which was agreed upon at the north-south summit of Korea and welcomed at the international arena, he said, and went on:
					
					 But the U.S. is displeased with it.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, obstructed the undertakings for cooperation between the north and the south and ceaselessly perpetrated military provocations.
					
					 The north-south relations are facing a bigger obstacle due to the present south Korean authorities.
					
					 But invariable are the will and stand of the Korean people to carry out the joint declarations to the letter under the leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in UK and Nigeria
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in UK and Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting was sponsored by the Korean Friendship Association UK and a film show by a farm in Zamfara State, Nigeria on June 6 and 9 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Participants in the film show watched the Korean film "The Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War".
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, said that the association has conducted positive activities for solidarity with the Korean people. Confrontation moves against the DPRK by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are getting more vicious, he noted, reaffirming his will to actively conduct a campaign for supporting the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country by various forms and methods.
					
					 The manager of a farm in Zamfara State, Nigeria and other speakers lauded President Kim Il Sung for leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
  Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties, organizations and institutions and personages of various circles of different countries visited DPRK embassies between June 1 and 17 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					  They laid floral baskets and bouquets before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings depicting them standing together before paying tribute to them.
					
					  They included delegations of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, and personages of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", the Communist Party of Peru, the Socialist Political Action Party of Peru, the Peruvian Group for the Study of the Kimilsungism Economic Theory, Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru, the Peruvian People's Women Union, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and representatives of foreign political parties, organizations and institutions residing in Cuba.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party of Venezuela, the chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and his family, the director of a Nigerian hospital and the director of a construction company in Nigeria also visited DPRK embassies.
					
					 A member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, the international secretary of the Communist Party of Venezuela and other personages lauded Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader who made immortal contribution to the global cause of independence.
					
					 They noted that supreme leader Kim Jong Un is developing the WPK into the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and dynamically advancing the socialist cause despite vicious offensive of the imperialists, thereby greatly encouraging all the progressive political parties of the world aspiring after socialism.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A seminar on leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Correctly Understanding the Originality of Kimilsungism" took place in Switzerland, round-table talks in Angola, lecture and film show in Guinea and book exhibition in Nigeria from June 12 to 15 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."
					
					 The chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a speech said Kim Jong Il formulated President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as Kimilsungism.
					
					 The Juche idea runs through Kimilsungism which forms an integral system of idea, theory and method.
					
					 The ism also gives perfect answers to all the issues arising in the revolution and construction.
					
					 A general of the security office of the presidency of Angola and other speakers said that Korean people could vigorously advance along the way opted by them as Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and increased the military capabilities of the country by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 They affirmed that the WPK will always win victory as it has supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de vuelo de aviadoras de cazas supersonicas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de vuelo de aviadoras de cazas supersonicas
						
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el entrenamiento de vuelo de Jo Kum Hyang y Rim Sol, aviadoras de cazas supersonicas.
					Antes de presenciar el adiestramiento, el Mariscal averiguo en la pista de aterrizaje el plan de entrenamiento individual de vuelo de despegue y aterrizaje de las aviadoras.
					
					Contemplando satisfactoriamente el entrenamiento, el Mariscal dijo que son admirables esas jovenes y que ellas son las flores del cielo. Prosiguio con alegria que nacieron por primera vez en la historia de fundacion del ejercito las aviadoras de cazas supersonicas.
					
					Observando los ejercicios de las aviadoras quienes superaban sin tropiezo las circunstancias inesperadas, recalco que le complace mucho ver esos entrenamientos tan intrepidos. Evaluo altamente que constituye el exito digno de enorgullecerse al mundo el hecho de que las muchachas manejan las cazas supersonicas que les cuestan mucho operar siquiera a los hombres.
					
					Terminados los ejercicios, el Mariscal se reunio con Jo Kum Hyang y Rim Sol y les felicito los exitos de entrenamiento.
					
					Tomando la mano de ellas quienes lloraban de alegria tras recibir los ramos florales, el Mariscal subrayo que ellas ejecutaron con exito la aviacion individual diciendo que solamente en algunos paises las aviadoras manejan las cazas supersonicas. Recalco que tal exito no se debe a la condicion fisica ni el perfecto estado de preparacion tecnica de ellas, sino al noble espiritu revolucionario de las aviadoras quienes aceptaron ideologicamente la orientacion del partido de dar prioridad al entrenamiento y apoyaron con fidelidad el proposito del Comandante Supremo guardando en lo profundo de su corazon el ferviente amor a la patria y el inconmovible espiritu de defensa a la patria.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto con las aviadoras.
					
					En la ocasion, el Mariscal fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, O Kum Chol y Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: No hay posibilidad de desaparecer larga sequia en RPDC
articles.content:
No hay posibilidad de desaparecer larga sequia en RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- Desde el dia 11 hasta el 20 del mes en curso llovieron mucho en las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, o sea cayeron 99 mm de lluvia en el distrito de Samchon, 97 mm en el distrito de Sinchon, 95 mm en la ciudad de Haeju, 72 mm en el distrito de Anak, 90 mm en el distrito de Sinphyong, 80 mm en el distrito de Unpha, 79 mm en el distrito de Koksan y 77 mm en el distrito de Suan. 
					Al respecto, el subjefe del Centro Nacional de Pronostico del Tiempo de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, Sim Myong Ok, dijo a la ACNC:
					
					Durante 10 dias pasados cayeron lluvias en algunas partes de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte, pero no se ve la posibilidad de desaparecer la sequia de largo plazo. 
					
					Debido a El Nino que perdura desde primavera del ano pasado, se iniciara tarde este ano la estacion lluviosa por la debilidad de alta presion atmosferica del Pacifico de noroeste que afecta a la region de Asia Oriental.
					
					En particular, se preven pocas precipitaciones en la estacion lluviosa.
